Package centralapp.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDpt
    AbstractDpt : Manage Department's name Contains and manage the name of Departments.Inherited by Departments and ManagementDpt
    AbstractPerson
    AbstractPerson : Manage Person's name Contains and manage the name of Person.
    Boss
    Boss : Manage Boss Get first and last name, and boss's String.
    CheckInOut
    CheckInOut : Manage Check In and Check out
    Company
    Company : Manage company Objects Attributes: name : Company name employeeList : Contains all the employees dptList : Contains all the departments managementDpt : Contains the Management Departments boss : Contains Boss Add an Employee or a Department, set Company name, find Employee, remove Employee or Department, test if Company contains an Employee or a Department
    Department
    Department : Manage Department Objects Attributes: Company : Reference to the Company employeeMap : Contains all the employees, indexed by their id nbEmployee : Number of employee in this Department manager : Contains reference to the manager Add, delete, get Employee, get Company, add, modify, delete, get Manager, delete Department.
    Employee
    Employee : Manage Employee Objects Attributes: Company : Reference to the Company id : Unique id of the employee nbEmployee : Contains all the departments dpt : Reference to the Management Departments checkInOut : ArrayList of all checks Get, add, modify Department, get, add, modify, delete CheckInOut, add and get Company, delete Employee
    ManagementDpt
    ManagementDpt : Manage the ManagementDpt Object Attributes: boss : reference to the boss of the Company managerList : ArrayList containing all Managers Extends AbstractDpt.
    Manager
    Manager : Manage Manager Objects Attributes: managementDpt : Reference to management Department Extends Employee.
    Test
    Test : Test class of model
